name: Cloudian Fog Convergence
text: When this card is activated: Place 4 fog counters on each monster on the field. When your opponent activates a monster effect while you control a "Cloudian" monster: You can remove 4 Fog counters from the field; negate the activation and if you do destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Cloudian Fog Convergence" once per turn.
